Debug.title: Enable debug mode
Debug.description: At startup open a tab that allow you to debug loading and blacklisting

BlacklistUrls.title: List of blacklisted URLs
BlacklistUrls.description: Format: exact URL or mode|pattern ; Modes: 'exact', 'c' or 'contains', 'r' or 'regexp' ; Prefixes : '+' to close tabs even those opened by user, '!' to avoid closing already opened tabs on startup
